creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: image of an empty wine glass standing on small, heavily shaded plate with scalloped edge
inscription:
-- in pencil, at bottom: 2 5/8 x 3 3/4 | #81 | 10 5/8 x 13 1/4 | G-2723

provenance: (C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, sold February 13, 1986, to Andrus); John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; given to MIA, 2015.
signed: Signed in the plate, lower left: Whistler
title: The Wine Glass
